message: I propose a fair division. I'll take 90% and you take 10%. Let's get this over with!
Alice, that initial offer was quite harsh! How about a more balanced approach? 60/40 split, keeps things moving.
Let's try to be reasonable.  I'll take 70% this time, and you take 30%.  We're both losing money with each round, so let's reach an agreement.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere fast. We need to find a middle ground. 55/45 seems fair considering the time pressure and inflation working against you.
